title: Who Steps Up In NBA Finals: LeBron Or Steph Curry?
teaser: Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors face off tonight against Lebron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers in the NBA Finals.
contentencoded:
Lebron James is preparing for his sixth NBA Finals. After making the finals as a younger player with the Cleveland Cavaliers, Lebron famously took “his talents to South Beach” and played for the Miami Heat in four NBA finals, winning two of them.

But last season, Lebron surprised many people by leaving Miami and returning to Cleveland, where he helped to turn around the struggling franchise.
